author: gsfs
body:
Fixed a typo in existing mixing scenario names to avoid future confusion.
Added new mixing scenario names for use with 5 TeV pp and PbPb
Automatically ported from CMSSW_8_0_X #12545 (original by @gsfs).

Automatically ported from CMSSW_8_1_X #13376 (original by @gsfs).
Automatically ported from CMSSW_9_0_X #16653 (original by @gsfs).
Please wait for a new IB (12 to 24H) before requesting to test this PR.
title: Update mixing scenario names
